Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: スージー
Entry.EnglishText: Susie

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: <unk19:D0FF1FC822E00C80>
Entry.EnglishText: <unk19:D0FF1FC822E00C80>

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の子
Entry.EnglishText: Boy

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウスト
Entry.EnglishText: Milhaust

Entry.JapaneseText: <Agarte>
Entry.EnglishText: <Agarte>

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas

Entry.JapaneseText: 装備品屋
Entry.EnglishText: Weapon Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なんかこの街、 妙な雰囲気じゃないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Something about this town seems kinda weird...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ううむ、ガジュマの姿が 見当たらないようだが…… そのせいか？
Entry.EnglishText: Hm... There don't seem to be any Gajuma around. Perhaps that's why?

Entry.JapaneseText: あの……ちょっとゴメンなさい。 あなたたち……サニイタウンで 会った……
Entry.EnglishText: Um... Excuse me. Didn't I meet you guys in Sunnytown?

Entry.JapaneseText: あッ！ ええっと……スージーだ！ そっか、ベルサスに住んでるって 言ってたっけ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh! Wait, don't tell me... You're Susie! That's right, you mentioned you lived in Belsas.

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり……！ あの時は本当にありがとう！ あなたたちが探していた人は 無事に戻ってきた？
Entry.EnglishText: So it is you! Thanks so much for helping me back then! Did you find who you were looking for, and did you get her home safely?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアだ。
Entry.EnglishText: This is Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: あ……は…… はじめまして……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, um... Nice to meet you...

Entry.JapaneseText: はじめまして、クレアさん。
Entry.EnglishText: Nice to meet you too, Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: スージー、ここで 何をしてたんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: So, Susie, what are you hanging around here for?

Entry.JapaneseText: お父様が旅行から帰っていらっしゃるの。 港まで迎えに行ったんだけど、 行き違いになったみたいで…… そろそろ帰らなくちゃだわ。
Entry.EnglishText: My father is returning from his travels today. I went to the port to meet him, but it looks like we missed each other... So I need to get back to my house.

Entry.JapaneseText: よかったら、後で私のお家に遊びに来て。 あの時のお礼もしたいし。きっとよ。
Entry.EnglishText: If it wouldn't be too much trouble, would you like to come and visit? I still need to give you a proper thanks. As promised.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか、感じが変わったなぁ。 元気っていうか、明るいっていうか。
Entry.EnglishText: Something's different about her now. I guess you could say she's more animated and cheerful.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今のが彼女の本来の姿なんだろう。 あの時と違って、笑顔が出るように なったんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: This is probably how she normally is. Unlike when we first met her, she actually has a reason to smile.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ…… <Blue>王の盾<White>やアガーテのせいで、 一体、どれだけの笑顔が 奪われたんだろうな……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, makes you wonder just how many smiles were robbed by the likes of the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> and Agarte...

Entry.JapaneseText: これからどうしますか？ 聖獣が、急がないと大切なものを 失うって、言ってましたけど……
Entry.EnglishText: What should we do now? The Sacred Beast said that something precious would be lost if we didn't hurry...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、心あたりは？
Entry.EnglishText: Any ideas, <Veigue>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 考えていても始まらん。 少し街の中を歩いてみよう。
Entry.EnglishText: We won't get anywhere just thinking about it. Let's try walking around town.

Entry.JapaneseText: ワン！
Entry.EnglishText: Woof!

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアというヒューマの娘を 見かけたら、必ず軍まで 連絡するように。
Entry.EnglishText: If you see a female Huma named Claire, make sure to contact the army immediately.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウスト将軍の命令で、 今後、情勢が落ち着くまでは、 我々カレギア軍が、この街に 駐留する事となった。
Entry.EnglishText: We, the Callegean Army, will be stationed here until everything has calmed down. Commander Milhaust's orders.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとガジュマの間で 問題が起こった時は、 すぐに我々に知らせてくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: Please let us know immediately if something happens between Huma and Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: この街もあまり状況はよくないが、 今、ミナールの治安は、 かなり悪化していると聞く。
Entry.EnglishText: The situation here has been rough, but I've also heard that Minal's peace has been slowly deteriorating as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: あちら方面へ行く時には、 十分注意するように。
Entry.EnglishText: If you're heading towards that direction, I recommend that you practice the utmost caution.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール……
Entry.EnglishText: Minal...

Entry.JapaneseText: 今は毎日のように、 ヒューマとガジュマの 小競り合いが起きている。
Entry.EnglishText: Daily skirmishes between Gajuma and Huma have been taking place here.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何かあったらすぐに 我々に伝えてくれ。 ガジュマどもを徹底的に 取り締まってやる！
Entry.EnglishText: Please let us know immediately if something happens. We will make sure to reprimand those Gajuma appropriately.

Entry.JapaneseText: この地鳴りはどこから 聞こえて来るんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Where on earth is this rumbling coming from?

Entry.JapaneseText: ミール広場に避難するんだ！ バイラスに襲われないよう 注意してくれ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hurry, evacuate to Mir Square! Keep an eye out for Biruses along the way too!

Entry.JapaneseText: この街の混乱に 拍車をかけるような 言動は慎んでくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: Please refrain from doing or saying anything that will add to the chaos.

Entry.JapaneseText: お姉ちゃん、ガジュマと 仲良くしちゃいけないんだよ！ スカラベさんに言っちゃおうっと！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, lady! Mr. Scarabe told me that you shouldn't get along with Gajuma!
Entry.Notes: deepL says that he's going to tell mr scarabe. Not really sure which is right, so leaving it as problematic.

Entry.JapaneseText: あっ、ガジュマだ！ ガジュマはこっちに 来ちゃダメなんだぞー！
Entry.EnglishText: A Gajuma! Gajuma aren't allowed here, y'know!

Entry.JapaneseText: お兄ちゃんたち、どーして ガジュマといっしょにいるの？ スカラベさんに怒られるよー！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, why are you walking around with Gajuma? You'll make Mr. Scarabe angry!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよー！ ガジュマはあっち行けよ！ ベロベロベー！
Entry.EnglishText: What do you want? Gajuma don't belong here! Pffffffffft!
Entry.Notes: dunno the onomatopoeia for blowing raspberries, but I assume it isn't this.

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、おにいちゃん、 デートしてるの？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, are the two of you on a date?

Entry.JapaneseText: いっしょにいるおねえさん、 キレイだねー！
Entry.EnglishText: The lady you have beside you sure is pretty!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとガジュマなら ヒューマのがずーっと 美人だよねー！
Entry.EnglishText: Huma will alwaaays be more prettier than Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマとなんか お話しないもんね！ ベロベロベー！
Entry.EnglishText: As if I'd talk to you, Gajuma! Pffffffffft!
Entry.Notes: ok, so real talk. I assume the kiid is sticking his tongue out and blowing raspberries or something, but idk the onomatopoeia for that.

Entry.JapaneseText: あーっ、おにいちゃん、 ヒューマなのにガジュマと いっしょにいるー！ いけないんだぞー!!
Entry.EnglishText: Oh you shouldn't be hanging with Gajuma! That's bad!

Entry.JapaneseText: おねえちゃんたち、 ヒューマなのに、 どーしてスカラベさんを 助けてくれなったんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, lady, why didn't you save Mr. Scarabe? Aren't you a Huma, too!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマなんか、 助けなくたっていいのに！
Entry.EnglishText: Those Gajuma aren't worth saving!

Entry.JapaneseText: ボク、ガジュマなんて 大っキライだ!! フン！
Entry.EnglishText: I really really hate Gajuma! Hmph!

Entry.JapaneseText: おにいちゃんたち、 すっごく強いけど…… ボク、キライだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: I hate you! Even though you look so strong... I really really hate you!

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしてガジュマを 助けたりするんだよ！ ボク、スカラベさんの事、 好きだったのに……！
Entry.EnglishText: Why did you save that Gajuma!? Why didn't you save Mr. Scarabe? I really liked him, you know!

Entry.JapaneseText: お父さんに聞いたぞ！ ガジュマは悪い事をしようと してるって！
Entry.EnglishText: My dad told me that Gajuma are always planning something bad!
Entry.Notes: same english text, different kanji. nuance and slang lost

Entry.JapaneseText: ボク、ガジュマなんか やっつけてやるもんね！
Entry.EnglishText: That's why I'm going to beat up those Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: お父さんが言ってたよ。 ガジュマが悪い事をしようと してるって！
Entry.EnglishText: My dad told me that Gajuma are always planning something bad!

Entry.JapaneseText: だからボク、ガジュマなんかに 負けないように戦う練習を してるんだ……ナイショだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: That's why I'm practicing so I won't lose against those Gajuma! Don't tell anyone, okay?

Entry.JapaneseText: ボ、ボクわからないけど…… ガジュマをキライじゃないと ヒューマじゃないんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: I-I don't know why, but... Huma who spend time with Gajuma aren't Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでガジュマなんかと 歩いてるの!?
Entry.EnglishText: Why are you spending time with Gajuma!?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマはこっちに 来ちゃいけないんだぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma aren't allowed here, y'know!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでガジュマなんかと 歩いてるの!?
Entry.EnglishText: Why are you spending time with Gajuma!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下は？
Entry.EnglishText: Did you find her?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……見失ってしまった……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm afraid she has vanished from my sight.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアを、ずっと このままの姿にしてはおけない。 早く探し出して……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire can't stay like this forever. We need to find her quickly...

Entry.JapaneseText: わかっている…… ……陛下は私が探し出す！ そして元の身体に……必ず！
Entry.EnglishText: I know that... I will go searching for her! And I will return her to her original body, no matter what!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ミルハウスト……
Entry.EnglishText: Milhaust...

Entry.JapaneseText: オレたちも アガーテを追おう。
Entry.EnglishText: We should go after Agarte as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: おお、もちろんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah! Sounds like a plan!

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと待って。
Entry.EnglishText: Wait a minute!

Entry.JapaneseText: キミたちに、 そんなゆとりはないよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You guys don't have time for that.

Entry.JapaneseText: キミたちは何よりも早く、浄化を 済ませたかったんじゃないのかい？ 早くぼくのところにおいで。 世界を浄化する力を手に入れるために。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't you guys want to finish the purification as soon as possible? Come and find me quickly, so you can get the power you need to purify the world.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアさんは、どうするんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: What are we supposed to do about Claire?

Entry.JapaneseText: 大事なのは心、でしょ？ <Veigue>、キミの大切なものは 失われずに済んだんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: What's most important is the heart, right? So in the end, you haven't lost what was important to you, <Veigue>.

Entry.JapaneseText: それは……
Entry.EnglishText: But...

Entry.JapaneseText: ぼくはバビログラードにいる。 近いうちに会えるのを、 楽しみにしているよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm in Babilograd. I'm looking forward to seeing you guys soon!

Entry.JapaneseText: 突然、ビックリした…… それで……どうする？
Entry.EnglishText: It freaks me out when he comes out of nowhere like that... Anyway, what now?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私……？ 私なら平気よ。 この身体にも慣れたし、 皆さんが一緒なら安心だわ。 それに……私は私だから。
Entry.EnglishText: Me...? I'm fine like this. I've gotten used to being in this body, and as long as I'm with you all, I'll be safe. Besides... I'm still me.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア…… 本当にいいのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>... Are you sure you're all right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ、行きましょう。 バビログラードへ！
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, let's go! Now, off to Babilograd.

Entry.JapaneseText: 改めて…… 皆さん、よろしくね。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, and... It's a pleasure to meet everyone.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ！ もちろん。 <Purple>さん<White>はナシでいくぜ。 よろしくな、クレア。
Entry.EnglishText: Of course! And I guess we don't have to worry about being polite and stuff. Welcome aboard, Claire!

Entry.JapaneseText: こんな事を言うべきでは ないのかもしれないが……
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps I shouldn't say this, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテ様の身体に入ったのが、 君で良かった…… 元に戻るまで、必ず君を守る。 命に代えても。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm glad that you're the one inhabiting Her Majesty's body. Until you have been returned to your own, I will do everything in my power to protect you. Even at the cost of my own life.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……出発しよう。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Let's head out.

Entry.JapaneseText: うん！ バビログラードで シャオルーンが待ってるヨ！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah! Shaorune's waiting for us in Babilograd!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:140><speed:0><font:80000002><unk19:340480>が仲間になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:140><speed:0><unk19:340480> joined the party.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:140><speed:0><font:80000002><unk19:341080>が同行します。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:140><speed:0><unk19:341080> is now travelling with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
